summary: I was sick of the Shrines in skyrim bein empty and unlived. so i done something about it =).
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00b050][SIZE=7][font=Palatino Linotype][b]Shrines Worshipers and Pilgrims[/b][/font][/SIZE][/color][/center]
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/3421441-1376299410.gif[/img][/center]

I was sick of the Shrines in skyrim being empty and unloved. So i done something about it =).

All shrines (that i could find in the creation kit) now have some sort of edit to it, Be it tent, bed more flowers ETC

[color=#00b050][font=Palatino Linotype][size=2][b]What does this do?[/b][/size][/font][/color]
There is Pilgrims and worshipers that will partoll and sandbox at these shrines then they will move on to the next (randomly) Through a package that i made from scratch.
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/3421441-1376299410.gif[/img][/center]

[color=#00b050][font=Palatino Linotype][size=2][b]There will be;?[/b][/size][/font][/color]
- 3-4 Unique Npc's that will Permanently be at their shrine, they all have unique names. One sells firewood in Rorikstead up on the big rock to the north of The tavern.
- There is also two that will be in the Eldergleam sanctuary.
- Two more that will walk the 7000 steps everyday.
- 10 More that will randomly go to all shrines.
- Mehrunes dagon shrine has had a remake and there is now two worshipers That live there (will attack the player)
- And no doubt there is probably some more that i'm forgetting.
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/3421441-1376299410.gif[/img][/center]

[color=#00b050][font=Palatino Linotype][size=2][b]Install/Uninstall;[/b][/size][/font][/color]
Install;
Please download the NMM and install because it is simple and i don't see why you wouldn't.
If not then extract the contents of the .zip into your Skyrim/data directory.
Uninstall;
Use NMM to uninstall.
Or delete the added contents that you had previously placed in your skyrim/data directory.
[color=#00b050][font=Palatino Linotype][size=2][b]incompatible;[/b][/size][/font][/color]
Anything that edits a Shrine locations, This doesn't include the city shrines but the ones in the wilderness.
Anything that edits Stendarr's Beacon.

Cleaned with Tes5edit and all faceGen is in a .Bsa
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/3421441-1376299410.gif[/img][/center]

[color=#00b050][font=Palatino Linotype][size=2][b]My other mods that work well with this one;[/b][/size][/font][/color]
The dragonborn's Eventful travels - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38559/?]Nexus[/url]
The nine traveling bards of Skyrim - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27510/]Nexus[/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=110609916 ]Steam[/url]
Adds nine bards to Skyrim that will sandbox around their respected hold, these bards are also followers.
author: JiubiIzeekk
